message.content:
{
  "daily_summary": "Broadly constructive session led by PSU banks and select pharma; IT weak. Notable strength: IDBI (+6% on heavy volume), INDUSTOWER (+6.7% closing near highs), LAURUSLABS (+6.6% breakout attempt). Our portfolio closed +1.56% with LAURUSLABS and INDUSTOWER offsetting a heavy-volume pullback in BSE. Cash remains ample (~26%) for a targeted add on a high-conviction breakout Monday. No emergency actions needed today.",
  "top_signals": [
    {
      "symbol": "IDBI",
      "signal": "Buy on breakout > 104.20; stop 98.50; initial targets 110/113",
      "reason": "Strong PSU bank momentum, highest volume in the screen, close near day’s high suggesting follow-through potential",
      "price": 104.2
    },
    {
      "symbol": "INDUSTOWER",
      "signal": "Momentum continuation above 386.50; trail stop to 372 on existing position",
      "reason": "Range breakout with high volume and close near high; trend intact, manage risk with a tighter trailing stop",
      "price": 385.9
    },
    {
      "symbol": "LAURUSLABS",
      "signal": "Buy on strength > 963; stop 936; targets 990/1015",
      "reason": "Wide-range green candle on volume, closing near high; potential continuation if HOD is reclaimed",
      "price": 963
    },
    {
      "symbol": "POLICYBZR",
      "signal": "Buy on breakout > 1790; stop 1730; target 1860",
      "reason": "Strong up day, testing recent highs; clean trigger above the day’s high with defined risk",
      "price": 1790
    },
    {
      "symbol": "SAIL",
      "signal": "Buy on breakout > 133.20; stop 129.50; target 138",
      "reason": "Metals firming; attempting to clear short-term resistance with decent volume",
      "price": 133.2
    }
  ],
  "emergency_trades": [],
  "portfolio": {
    "cash": 6942.2,
    "total_value": 26356.35,
    "holdings_count": 5,
    "holdings": [
      "BSE: 1 units",
      "LTF: 30 units",
      "BEL: 10 units",
      "LAURUSLABS: 3 units",
      "INDUSTOWER: 5 units"
    ]
  },
  "screening_notes": [
    "Position management (current holdings): LTF hold; tighten risk below 262 (today’s LL 266.28). INDUSTOWER trail stop 372; consider add only on >386.5. LAURUSLABS protect with stop ~936. BSE watch 2400 support; if a daily close <2380, consider cutting the lone share. BEL hold; add only on decisive close >417.",
    "PSU banks strong across the board (IDBI, UNIONBANK, INDIANB, CENTRALBK, IOB, UCOBANK); focus on IDBI for clean, liquid setup.",
    "IT weak: KPITTECH and MPHASIS sold off; avoid fresh buys in IT until reversal signals appear.",
    "Metals mixed but improving breadth: JINDALSTEL strong; SAIL nearing breakout; HINDCOPPER soft—prefer steel over copper near term.",
    "Power/utilities mixed: TORNTPOWER pulled back sharply; watch for stabilization above 1265 before considering.",
    "High-volume move down in BSE may indicate distribution; give it room but respect 2380 on closing basis.",
    "POLICYBZR closed strong; breakout through 1790 would confirm continuation.",
    "KPIL and ABB showed relative strength; keep on secondary watchlist for follow-through next week.",
    "Consumption mixed (MARICO flat, VBL soft); no high-conviction signals today.",
    "Monday plan with current cash: Priority 1 = IDBI breakout >104.2 (position ~₹5–6k). Alternate = LAURUSLABS add on >963 (very small add, 1–2 shares) if IDBI doesn’t trigger."
  ]
}
